title: Firewall Error
body:
ok so i have tried everything but my LoL client wont even load, i just get the stupid firewall error issue that was a problem back on the game loading screen. I have tried reinstall and checked my firewall settings. Even updated my pc as this happened to me on riots last lol patch and updating my windows 10 worked. This time it hasn't and its the second patch this has happened to me with. 

Any solutions would be welcome as i am rather annoyed with this issue ocuring

replies.body: Out of curiosity are you using ZoneAlarm as your firewall?

Im not, just windows basic firewall at the moment. its a new laptop so until i have it set up no use using anything else. 

I did however manage to fix the issue this was posted to however am back to square one again after very little time using league. tried everything i have tried in the past again managed to fix it by updating my drivers........ which lasted all of one day and now i am back to the rads error again. it is getting rather frustrating now lol. wish they could hurry with a fix for this :s
